an5.54:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jinno hoti jarayabhibhuto.
an5.54:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu byadhito hoti byadhinabhibhuto.
an5.54:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, dubbhikkham hoti dussassam dullabhapindam, na sukaram unchena paggahena yapetum.
an5.54:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhayam hoti atavisankopo, cakkasamarulha janapada pariyayanti.
an5.54:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sangho bhinno hoti.
an5.54:5.2: Sanghe kho pana, bhikkhave, bhinne annamannam akkosa ca honti, annamannam paribhasa ca honti, annamannam parikkhepa ca honti, annamannam pariccaja ca honti.
an5.54:5.3: Tattha appasanna ceva nappasidanti, pasannananca ekaccanam annathattam hoti.
an5.54:5.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca asamaya padhanayati.
an5.54:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu daharo hoti yuva susu kalakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannagato pathamena vayasa.
an5.54:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appabadho hoti appatanko, samavepakiniya gahaniya samannagato natisitaya naccunhaya majjhimaya padhanakkhamaya.
an5.54:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, subhikkham hoti susassam sulabhapindam, sukaram unchena paggahena yapetum.
an5.54:9.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, manussa samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharanti.
an5.54:10.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sangho samaggo sammodamano avivadamano ekuddeso phasu viharati.
an5.54:10.2: Sanghe kho pana, bhikkhave, samagge na ceva annamannam akkosa honti, na ca annamannam paribhasa honti, na ca annamannam parikkhepa honti, na ca annamannam pariccaja honti.
an5.54:10.3: Tattha appasanna ceva pasidanti, pasannananca bhiyyobhavo hoti.
an5.54:10.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca samaya padhanaya”ti.
